Interface GeometryParams

Non-compressed geometry parameters for SceneModel.createGeometry.

Summary
  • Contains uncompressed, human-readible geometry parameters for SceneModel.createGeometry
  • Use GeometryCompressedParams to convert to {@link compressGeometryParams} for SceneModel.createGeometryCompressed

Hierarchy

  • GeometryParams

Index

Properties

  • colors
  • edgeThreshold
  • id
  • indices
  • origin

Properties

Optional colors

colors: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryParams.ts:50

Flat array of uncompressed floating-point vertex colors.

Alternative to {@link GeometryParams.colorsCompressed}.

Optional edgeThreshold

edgeThreshold: number
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryParams.ts:69

The threshold angle, in degrees, beyond which the deviation in normal directions of each pair of adjacent faces results in an edge being automatically generated between them.

Only works for primitive types {@link SolidPrimitive}, {@link SurfacePrimitive} and {@link TrianglesPrimitive}.

Default is 10.

Ignored when {@link GeometryParams.edgeIndices} is defined.

id

id: string
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryParams.ts:22

ID for the geometry.

Optional indices

indices: IntArrayParam
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryParams.ts:57

Flat array of primitive connectivity indices.

Ignored for primitive type {@link PointsPrimitive}, which does not need indices.

origin

origin: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryParams.ts:17

RTC origin for the geometry.

positions

positions: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryParams.ts:36

Flat array of uncompressed floating point 3D vertex positions.

Alternative to {@link GeometryParams.positionsCompressed}.

primitive

primitive: number
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryParams.ts:29

Primitive type.

Accepted values are {@link SolidPrimitive}, {@link SurfacePrimitive}, {@link LinesPrimitive}, {@link PointsPrimitive} and {@link TrianglesPrimitive}.
